products.pro_meta_description: Buy DJI Neo 2 Standard lightweight 4K camera drone in Bangladesh. Ideal for beginners, vloggers, and travel with smart features.
products.product_description: The DJI Neo 2 Standard is a lightweight and compact 4K camera drone designed for beginners, vloggers, and everyday content creators. Featuring a 12MP camera, 2-axis mechanical gimbal, and advanced stabilization, it delivers smooth and high-quality video footage. With smart flight modes, gesture control, obstacle detection, and up to 19 minutes of flight time, the DJI Neo 2 Standard is ideal for travel, selfie videos, and social media content creation. Its built-in internal storage and easy smartphone control make it a perfect choice for users in Bangladesh looking for a reliable and user-friendly drone.
